extension.description: CellarDoorTV Wizard allows you to get access to the latest CDTV Custom Builds and more.[CR]Credits - A huge thanks goes out to [COLOR deepskyblue]Surfacingx[/COLOR] the creator of the Aftermath Wizard for bringing this outstanding Wizard to this community.[CR]Contact - For help and support go to CellarDoorTV Facebook group.[CR]Follow me on Twitter or visit our website at https://cellardoortv.wordpress.com

Kodi Repository for [COLOR steelblue]CellarDoorTV[/COLOR][CR][COLOR steelblue]CellarDoorTV[/COLOR] [COLOR white]Repo[/COLOR] allows you to install our CDTV Wizard and get access to the latest CDTV Custom Builds and more.[CR]This repo will keep your CDTV Wizard and [COLOR steelblue]Hypersonic[/COLOR] [COLOR white]IPTV2[/COLOR] add-on updated with future updates.[CR]For more info go to [COLOR yellowgreen]https://www.hypersonic-tv.com[/COLOR] or email [COLOR yellowgreen]hypersonictvpro@gmail.com[/COLOR] to request your username and password.[CR][COLOR yellowgreen]Thank you![/COLOR]

[COLOR steelblue]Hypersonic[/COLOR] [COLOR white]IPTV[/COLOR] Official Addon - The Future of Great Quality and Stable Streams - for more info go to [COLOR yellowgreen]https://www.hypersonic-tv.com[/COLOR] or email [COLOR yellowgreen]hypersonictvpro@gmail.com[/COLOR] to request your username and password. Due to unexpected volumes, it is taking us a little longer than we would like to respond to emails. Please allow 24hrs for response. Regards, Hypersonic Team.
Integrate any plugin installed to IVUE guide easily and quickly
Now includes a fully functioning back up and restore feature
extension.disclaimer: Modified by TeamJDM from the original code from "Primeaval"

extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions. Uses [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] for playback and library functions.

Dit script biedt meerdere mogelijkheden om online content weer te geven in skins en bevat ook een complete MovieDB browser inclusief info dialogen voor verscheidene media types. Gebruikte diensten zijn themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com en nog veel meer. Vereist skin implementatie voor de meeste functies. Gebruikt [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] voor afspeel en bibliotheek functies.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991
